purpose.summary: This file is an IMS Program Specification Block (PSB) definition that generates PSBPAUTB for COBOL programs. It defines a single database PCB named PAUTBPCB for the DBD DBPAUTP0 with PROCOPT=AP and KEYLEN=14, providing access to the root segment PAUTSUM0 and its child segment PAUTDTL1. The PSB is generated in COBOL language with CMPAT=YES for compatibility.
purpose.business_context: Defines IMS hierarchical database access structure for PAUT-related summary (PAUTSUM0) and detail (PAUTDTL1) segments, likely supporting batch DL/I applications for business data such as purchase authorizations or similar transactional records.

inputs.name: PAUTSUM0
inputs.description: Root segment (PARENT=0) of the DBPAUTP0 IMS database accessible via PAUTBPCB

inputs.name: PAUTDTL1
inputs.description: Child segment (PARENT=PAUTSUM0) of the DBPAUTP0 IMS database accessible via PAUTBPCB

open_questions.question: Exact meaning of PROCOPT=AP in this IMS PCB context
open_questions.context: Standard IMS PROCOPT values include G,I,U etc., but AP is specified without further code to clarify usage (e.g., path calls or specific authorities)
open_questions.suggestion: Consult IMS manuals or DBD definitions for DBPAUTP0 to confirm PROCOPT interpretation

open_questions.question: Business meaning of PAUTSUM0 and PAUTDTL1 segments
open_questions.context: Segment names suggest summary/detail structure for 'PAUT' data, but no field-level details or application context provided
open_questions.suggestion: Review DBD source for DBPAUTP0 or associated COBOL programs using this PSB
